turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello. how can I help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order three medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds delicious. What toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like them all veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Was regular crust ok or did you want another option?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so the order is for 3 medium pizzas, all veggie lovers, all with gluten free crust. is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $39.99 is the total. Should I place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I've submitted the order. It'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you need my help with anything else?
